## Setup
```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```

## Plot
```{r}
#| label: fig-cars
#| fig-cap: Scatter plot of mpg vs hp colored by am
mtcars |> 
  mutate(am = as.factor(am)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = mpg, y = hp, color = am)) +
  geom_point() 
```

## Table
```{r}
#| label: tbl-cars
#| tbl-cap: First 5 rows of mtcars

mtcars |> 
  head(5) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
